Bellossom (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0181: Ampharos
Pokémon
#0183: Marill →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Bellossom (TCG Pocket).

Bellossom has been featured on 13 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Bellossom cards are normally Grass-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Bellossom

Bellossom
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese

Bellossom EX Unseen Forces 3/115 Golden Sky, Silvery Ocean 007/106
Bellossom δ EX Holon Phantoms 19/110 Holon Phantom 013/052
Bellossom Legends Awakened 20/146 Temple of Anger  
Bellossom Undaunted 1/90 Reviving Legends 004/080
Bellossom Boundaries Crossed 4/149 Freeze Bolt 004/059
Bellossom Ancient Origins 4/98 Bandit Ring 004/081
Bellossom Crown Zenith 003/159 Paradigm Trigger 003/098
Bellossom Obsidian Flames 003/197 Ruler of the Black Flame 003/108
